how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: A simple process with quick implementation that upgrades your hotel in minutes.
how_it_works.step_1_desc: A simple scan of the QR code in the room opens the service menu. No app download or registration required.
how_it_works.step_2_desc: The request appears instantly on the tablet or mobile of the relevant staff member (Reception, Housekeeping, Kitchen).
how_it_works.step_3_desc: Get business insights in real-time: response times, satisfaction, and upsell opportunities.

benefits.title: Why Hotel Owners Choose HotelX?
benefits.subtitle: We understand the challenges of running a modern hotel. Our system is built specifically to help you streamline processes, save costs, and improve guest experience - all in one simple platform.
benefits.item_1_desc: Guests order up to 30% more services when the process is digital and simple.
benefits.item_2_desc: Automation of routine requests frees up staff to focus on personal service.
benefits.item_3_desc: Faster response times and full transparency for guests increase ratings.
benefits.item_4_desc: Detailed reports on staff performance and response times in real-time.

features.title: All Tools for Modern Hotel Management
features.subtitle: One system that fully answers the needs of your hotel, staff, and guests.
features.f1_desc: Guests scan and order instantly. A modern, fast interface that works on any smartphone without installation.
features.f2_desc: All requests in one place. Real-time task management, staff notifications, and execution tracking.
features.f3_desc: Guests order in French, staff receives in English. Breaking the language barrier automatically.
features.f4_desc: Generate unique codes for each room or area. Update menus and services in real-time without reprinting.
features.f5_desc: Understand guest behavior, peak times, staff performance, and most profitable services.
features.f6_desc: Define roles (Front Desk, Housekeeping, Kitchen) and custom access for each staff member.

smart_monitoring.title: Smart Monitoring & Guest Satisfaction
smart_monitoring.subtitle: Never miss an issue. Our intelligent system automatically tracks service times, detects delays, and empowers guests to provide feedback - keeping you in control.
smart_monitoring.estimated_time_desc: Each service has a predefined estimated delivery time. The system tracks actual delivery times and alerts you when orders exceed expectations.
smart_monitoring.auto_complaint_desc: If an order takes longer than 120% of the estimated time, guests automatically see a 'Report Issue' button. This proactive approach helps you catch problems before they escalate.
smart_monitoring.reviews_desc: After each completed order, guests can rate the service (1-5 stars) and leave comments. Track satisfaction by category: Quality, Speed, Staff, Value, and Overall.
smart_monitoring.tracking_desc: All guest complaints are centralized in your dashboard. Assign to staff, track resolution status, and prioritize urgent issues. Never lose track of guest concerns.
smart_monitoring.proactive_desc: By detecting delays automatically and making it easy for guests to report issues, you can address problems immediately - often before guests even think to complain.
smart_monitoring.improvement_desc: Review ratings and feedback to identify trends. See which services need improvement, which staff excel, and where to invest for better guest satisfaction.
smart_monitoring.step_1_desc: Guest orders a service with estimated delivery time (e.g., 20 minutes)
smart_monitoring.step_2_desc: If order exceeds 120% of estimated time, guest sees 'Report Issue' button automatically
smart_monitoring.step_3_desc: Complaint appears in your dashboard immediately, allowing you to resolve issues proactively
